attributes.action: Stop the theft of tax payers money by allowing persons fron Poland to claim child benefit for children residing in Poland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I disagree with the fact that the British public is paying for the Child Support benefit for thousands of Polish children who are not residing here but in the UK.  The Polish citizens are currently claiming as stated in the national press millions of pounds a year of tax payers money for children that remain in Poland.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
